Goth style adventure. A demo as I am designing the live game.

Those who play the demo version to live version will be reward.

The storyline is written but still a secert to the public as we get closer to live launch.

DISCORD - Evolution Artist Productions

Current Version V 0.0.05

++Changes++  

-Forest of Souls - Overall Layout

  

++Fixes++

- The 2 current shops been adjusted for interaction. (can engage with them 1 step ahead of them) Before was player and event when touching.

- FPS refresh pillar added to fix FPS of savedata games that get carried over to future version of the game.

GUIDE LEGEND FOR PROGRESS SEEN COMPLETEIN-PROGRESSNO-PROGRESS

This will be an outline of projected goal till Demo reaches the newest version.


+Region Boss Spawning+Random Spawning Searchable Objects+ Zone Level 5-10 +Waypoints+Harvesting+Battle UI change +Updated Cooking recipes
